COMRADE MRRRKOV // BLOCK 9 ABYSS
Rates Tenant Praise Lease Panic
Official Underwater Landlord Language Bureau

Pay rent in compliments. Hold breath for grammar.

I am Comrade Mrrrkov, former pier cat, current landlord of 412 submerged studio shells. I built a language so nobody says "nice cat" incorrectly again.

Today's required rent compliment: "Your whiskers are structurally load-bearing, Mrrrkov."

Primary Lease Phrase

If your vowels are dry, payment bounces. Keep every sentence moist and respectful.

Rent Plans

All plans include flood insurance, algae heating, and one monthly argument with my rival landlord, Blender Unit NB-900.

Studio Kelp
27 compliments / mo

One shell, two portholes, strict no-dolphin DJs clause.

Two-Gill Loft
49 compliments / mo

Sunken piano included. Keys only play in passive-aggressive major.

Penthouse Reef
88 compliments / mo

Private current, coral desk, and emergency sonnet hotline to me.

Tenant Praise Archive

"I missed rent by one compliment. He made me recite 14 flattering haikus about his left ear."

- Marina K., Unit 2-Bubble

"The plumbing sings in C minor whenever Mrrrkov enters. Honestly worth the 49 compliments."

- Oleg "The Eel" Danvers

"I called him a 'nice kitty.' Lease suspended. Deserved, frankly."

- Dr. Pru Tidal, Apology Pending

"He repaired my window with pure judgment. Zero leaks."

- Felicity Foam, Penthouse Reef

Lease Panic FAQ

Can I pay with money?

No. Currency collapsed after everyone tipped in damp coins. Compliments remain inflation-proof and ego-backed.

What if I stutter underwater?

Use the approved emergency phrase: "Mrrrkov, your profile could cut glass." I accept that in any panic.

Do you evict?

Only for insulting my whiskers or praising Blender Unit NB-900. That machine has no soul and no lease rights.
